QuestData.Title: WANTED: Zorbo the Advisor
QuestData.Description: Wanted: Dead or Alive$B$BZorbo the Advisor, wanted for numerous planned attacks on Telaar. Along with his reavers and shaman, Zorbo has slain countless Broken. Consider Zorbo as armed, dangerous, and merciless.$B$BZorbo makes his home in the Laughing Skull Ruins in the northern mountains of Nagrand.$B$BReward for Zorbo the Advisor's death or capture to be dispensed by Warden Moi'bff Jill at Telaar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Zorbo the Advisor, 5 Warmaul Shaman and 5 Warmaul Reavers. Return to Warden Moi'bff Jill if you manage to complete this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you here to collect a reward?
QuestData.RewardText: This is a great victory for the people of Telaar! Well done, $n!
